1.title: the beginning

13.content:
Today your mother had said you were staying over at your aunt Margrets until school started as she was going away on a business meeting. You had always hated your aunt Margret and she hated you and now you had to stay an entire week with her on the last week of summer your mother must really hate you.

Later that day your mother brought you to your aunt Margrets house and dropped your sisters off at their friends houses. Why did your friends all have to be away this week? Then you rapped on the door and your aunt answered it and glared at you. She then showed you to a room which was extremely crampedand then told you to sort your own food out with the money your mother gae you before leaving.You just went to the local chippy then went to bed.

The next morning you woke up with a sore head but you gradually just drift back to sleep. When you wake up you notice everything is dark and you realised that your quilt was on top of you. You try to move it but you find you can't then you see a light and go to it. It took a few minutes to get to it and when you got to it you fell onto the ground which fortunately was soft. info.brief_description: You wake up and realise that you have shrunk. Will you ever be normal size again
info.description:
OK in this interactive you are a boy called Daniel and you wake up to find you have been shrunk

Characters
Daniel:aged 16 fair hair and he is quite small for his age(even now). He enjoys playing games consoles and is quite smart
Lucy:aged 12 Is Daniels younger sister has long, brown hair in a ponytail. She doesn't care much for Daniel as he always says mean things about her (she is taller than Daniel)
Jane:aged 20 Daniels older sister, she has long blong,straight hair. She likes Daniel most of the time except when he is a pain. She is the tallest in the family
Rachel: aged 40 Daniel and his sisters mum. She has short brown hair and is the smallest in the family (at the minute)
Margret:aged 42 Daniels Auntie she doesn't like Daniel at all but loves his sisters. She has the same hair style as Daniels mother and is just slightly taller than her
Sally:aged 14 Daniels cousin she was taught to hate him by her mother. She has long blond hair in a ponytail and is taller than your aunt and your mother but not you

New characters may be added
Rules

1. No swearing
2. No males in the story
3.Daniel shrinks and grows at random times and he has no control over it
4. No growth bigger than the height he is now
5. I would prefer it if Daniel is found and tortured but a few unaware ones will be fine
6.toilet stuff is allowed but don't flush him away
7. Daniel is indestructable while shrunk
8.no forced continues have at least two options
9.No explinations as to why he shrunk
10. endings are allowed but remember rule 8 so the story must go on

Other than that enjoy and make an addition and GP are available for good additions
